title: E-Commerce Website
description: This is a project made with complete React js.

title: Hotel Booking
description: This project facilitates efficient management of hotel operations, enabling users to view available rooms with pricing details, make room reservations, and receive detailed invoice bills via email. Implemented features to calculate total invoice bills in real-time during the booking process, enhancing user experience and streamlining hotel management processes

title: Product Management
description: This is a project made with Spring MVC and Thymeleaf. The Product Management CRUD application is a simple, yet comprehensive tool designed to manage product information efficiently. This application allows users to Create, Read, Update, and Delete product records, making it easy to handle product data in various contexts such as inventory management, e-commerce, and more.

title: Hospital Management
description: The Hospital Management System is a web-based application designed to efficiently manage hospital operations, including patient records, doctor schedules, appointments, and billing. Developed using Java Servlets, JDBC, HTML, CSS, and JSP, it provides a seamless interface for both staff and patients.The system allows for easy CRUD operations on patient and doctor data, appointment scheduling, and billing management, with a MySQL database ensuring secure data storage. By automating administrative tasks, the system enhances overall hospital efficiency and improves patient care.
